sentences.en: That is the first principle of social entrepreneurship collaboratory of the SE lab.
sentences.cn: 这是 SE 实验室社会企业家精神合作的第一原则。

sentences.en: Because without curiosity we will lose the spirit of innovation and entrepreneurship.
sentences.cn: 因为没有好奇心，我们就会失去创新和创业精神。

sentences.en: Entrepreneurship at the small business administration is now the fastest-growing major in business schools.
sentences.cn: 小企业管理局的创业学现在是商学院中增长最快的专业。
